name: Amy's Larb
ingredients: 1 teaspoon sambal oelek or Asian chili paste

instructions.en: In a medium skillet or wok, brown the chicken; drain any excess fat.
instructions.sk: V stredne veľkej panvici alebo woku opečte kuracie mäso do hneda; zlejte prebytočný tuk.
instructions.ja: 中サイズのフライパンまたは中華鍋で鶏肉を炒めて茶色くし、余分な脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Add the remaining ingredients and heat through.
instructions.ja: 残りの材料を加えて全体を温めます。

instructions.en: Serve wrapped in lettuce leaves, using two small leaves per serving.
instructions.sk: Podávajte zabalené v šalátových listoch, použite dva malé listy na jednu porciu.
instructions.ja: レタスの葉で包んで提供します。1人分につき小さな葉2枚を使用します。

notes: Makes 4 servings. Can be frozen without the lettuce. Mint and cayenne can be omitted based on preference or availability.
